metadata.title: CVE-2022-0546 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A missing bounds check in the image loader used in Blender 3.x and 2.93.8leads to out-of-bounds heap access, allowing an attacker to cause denial ofservice, memory corruption or potentially code execution.

criterions.comment: blender: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
